content.rendered:
Directed by Ponram.

Written by Ponram. Ponram. Ponram.

Cast Sivakarthikeyan(Seema Raja and Kadambavel Raja (as Siva Karthikeyan)). Samantha Ruth Prabhu(Suthanthira Selvi ‘Selvi’ (as Samantha Akkineni)). Soori(Adiasamy (Kanakku / Maths)). Simran(Kaaleeshwari). Lal(Kaathadi Kannan). Napolean(Ariya Raja). Keerthy Suresh(Special Appearance (as Keerthi Suresh)). Manobala(School Headmaster). Motta Rajendran(Gusthi Vaathiyar (as Rajendran)).Ramasamy. Swaminathan(Forest officer Pulimurugan). Nadodigal Gopal(Selvi’s Step Father). Supergood Subramani(Raja’s Sidekick).Thavasi. Meirajan(Seemaraja’s Sidekick). Sriranjani(Rani) .Isshu Tomar

Language Tamil.

Producers R.D. Raja. Shishpal Singh.

Production 24AM Studios.
